GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: Check if modulo is 0 before dividing.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 07efce8269a038c37814eb656b4de14aa3015fc6. For more details please see the references link.
